name: 3Defy
overview:
3Defy is a software development company which specializes in browser-based 3D software. 3Defy designs, builds, and deploys technology solutions which take advantage of emerging web 3D technologies, including Flash Player 11 (Stage 3D/Molehill) and HTML5 (WebGL).

3Defy also provides free web-based tools and services to the online 3D community. Its flagship product enables the conversion of 2D photos into 3D models.

3Defy takes on software consulting projects in the following areas: â€¢ Interactive 3D Experiences â€¢ Browser-Based 3D Gaming â€¢ 3D Graphics, Modeling, and Animation â€¢ Cloud Deployment

3Defy specializes in projects implementing the following technologies: â€¢ Flash Player 11 (Stage 3D) â€¢ HTML5 (WebGL) â€¢ Flex/AIR â€¢ Javascript â€¢ LAMPStack (Apache, MySQL, PHP) â€¢ TomcatStack (Apache, Tomcat, MySQL, Java)
